definitions.definition: An acknowledgment of gratitude , respect or admiration ; an accompanying gift .
examples: Please accept this as a tribute of our thanks.

subdefinitions.definition: An homage made in a body of work to another work or creator .
examples: Did you catch the Up in Smoke tribute in that episode of That '70s Show ?

definitions.definition: A payment made by one nation to another in submission .
examples: The Ancient Romans made their conquered countries pay tribute .

definitions.definition: A payment made by a feudal vassal to his lord .
A certain proportion of the mined ore , or of its value , given to the miner as payment .

main_definition: An acknowledgment of gratitude , respect or admiration ; an accompanying gift .
secondary_definitions: A payment made by one nation to another in submission .
A payment made by a feudal vassal to his lord .
( mining ) A certain proportion of the mined ore , or of its value , given to the miner as payment .
( Internet slang , vulgar ) Ellipsis of cum tribute .
